subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Romário led Brazil to a World Cup title as a player in 1994, but as a congressman from Rio de Janeiro he says hosting the event next year is a waste of money.
snippet: Romário led Brazil to a World Cup title as a player in 1994, but as a congressman from Rio de Janeiro he says hosting the event next year is a waste of money.
